text: Ni nganichiŵa chipanje chenu namuno ŵanache ŵenu kuti ni yaim’bandichisye Kukwetu pa dalaja (ja ku Mbepo), pangaŵaga jwakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone. Basi ŵanganyao tachipata malipilo gakonjechesya ligongo lya yaŵapanganyisye, soni ŵanganyao mu yumba (yapenani ya ku Mbepo) takaŵe ŵantunjelele
